abstract.p: Joan Mary Macey letter agrees with Robert Packard's April 2 travel article on recounting of travel experiences (S)

block.p: To the Editor: About ''One Traveler's Credo: Don't Tell, Don't Ask'' by Robert Packard (April 2), Mr. Packard's advice to check your travel monologue at the door was sage and well founded. Trip tales with visuals rank right up there with stories of grandchildren and hospital stays with H.M.O. complications. It is difficult, when trapped with a ''reliving the harrowing-experience-at-30,000-feet'' ex-vacationer not to utter ''Next time buy a one-way ticket!''
